Sentencas: The influence of water vapor in the air on the performance and durability of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been investigated for the-state-of-the-art cathodes.
Titulo: Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Durability experiments were carried out at 800 degrees C up to 1000 h with various water vapor containing-air fed to the cathode side.
Titulo: Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Both types of cathode materials were basically stable under typical water vapor concentrations in the ambient air.
Titulo: Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Degradations could be accelerated at much higher water vapor concentrations, which could be associated with the decomposition of the cathode materials.
Titulo: Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Temperature dependence of this degradation was analyzed between 700 degrees C and 900 degrees C under 10 vol% water vapor concentration, which showed that the effect of water vapor depends strongly on the temperature and led to a severe degradation at 700 degrees C within a short time period for both cathode materials.
Titulo: Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
Influence of water vapor on long-term performance and accelerated degradation of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
